title: Batch: Fork Bomb
desc: Creates exponentially more processes until the computer crashes

title: Powershell: Memory Crash
desc: Doubles the size of a file until the disk fails or the disk fills up

title: Powershell: Anti-Enumeration
desc: Prevents a user from opening files, starting/stopping processes, using terminals, and opening new apps

title: Powershell: Keylogger
desc: Logs all keystrokes to a file or to stdout

title: Bash: Fork Bomb
desc: Creates exponentially more processes until the computer crashes

title: Bash: Memory Crash
desc: Writes random data to a file until the disk fills up

title: HTML: Doubling Integer DOS
desc: Doubles an integer in the user"s browser until the browser or computer crashes. NOTE: command is encoded in base64

title: HTML: Excessive Video Streaming DOS
desc: Attempts to load 30+ 4k videos at the same time until the browser or computer crashes. NOTE: may take longer to see effects on higher performance systems

title: HTML: Worker Overload
desc: Starts creating workers (HTML5 only) to cause the browser crash

title: HTML: Too Many Canvases
desc: Creates 4096x4096 canvases as fast as possible to overload system resources
